sentences.sContent: ...pests like aphids which infest cereal crops.
sentences.sCn: …像蚜虫那样大肆侵害谷类作物的害虫。

synos.tran: 骚扰；寄生于；大批出没；大批滋生

remMethod.val: in(进入) + fest(匆忙) → (繁殖)得很快 → 大批滋生

trans.tranCn: 骚扰；寄生于；大批出没；大批滋生
trans.tranOther: if insects, rats etc infest a place, there are a lot of them and they usually cause damage
